  • Constructor Details

    • SimplePerson

      public SimplePerson​(String lastName, String firstName, int birthYear, int birthMonth, int birthDay)
      Builds a new instance
      Parameters:
      lastName - The person's last name
      firstName - The person's first (given) name
      birthYear - The person's birth year (e.g., 1998 for birth date 1998-7-12)
      birthMonth - The person's birth month (1 for January, ..., 12 for December)
      birthDay - The person's birth day in the month (e.g., 12 for birth date 1998-7-12)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the arguments do not constitute a valid birth date

    • wasBorn

      public boolean wasBorn​(GregorianCalendar date)
      Description copied from interface: IPerson
      Decides whether this person was born at a given date. The person is considered to be born on her birthdate.
      Specified by:
      wasBorn in interface IPerson
      Parameters:
      date - A date
      Returns:
      true if this person was born at the given date, false otherwise

    • getAge

      public int getAge​(GregorianCalendar date)
      Description copied from interface: IPerson
      Return this person's age at a given date, in years. The birthday is included in the new year, so that, e.g., a person born 2000-10-17 is considered to be 12 years old on 2012-10-17. A person is considered to be 0 years old from the day she is born on to the day before her first birthday. The person must be born at the given date, as decided by method wasBorn(java.util.GregorianCalendar).
      Specified by:
      getAge in interface IPerson
      Parameters:
      date - The date when the age must be evaluated
      Returns:
      this person's age at a given date, in years
